member.name: T:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient
member.summary: Provides a set of methods and events to interact with the Twitch IRC service.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Connected
member.summary: Occurs when the client connects.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Occurs when the client disconnects.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ClientJoined
member.summary: Occurs when the client joins a channel.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ClientParted
member.summary: Occurs when the client parts a channel.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.UserJoined
member.summary: Occurs when a user joins a channel the client is in.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.UserParted
member.summary: Occurs when a user parts a channel the client is in.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ChatMessage
member.summary: Occurs when a user sends a message to a channel the client is in.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ChatCommand
member.summary: Occurs when a user sends a command message to a channel the client is in.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Raid
member.summary: Occurs when a user raids a channel the client is in.

member.name: F:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.SoundAlertsDetected
member.summary: Occurs when a sound alerts event is detected in a channel the client is in.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Nickname
member.summary: Gets the nickname used by the client.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Token
member.summary: Gets the token used by the client.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.CommandIdentifier
member.summary: Gets or sets the command identifier recognized by the client.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the client is connected.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.LastMessageSent
member.summary: Gets the last message sent by the client.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Channels
member.summary: Gets a list of channel names the client is in.

member.name: P:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Users
member.summary: Gets a list of usernames in the channels the client is in.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Char})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ChatClient class, and sets the properties to the specified values.
member.param: The nickname to use.
The token to use.
The command identifier character; default is '!'.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Connect
member.summary: Connects the client socket and starts raising events.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the client socket and stops raising events.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.JoinChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Joins the client to the specified channel.
member.param: The name of the channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.JoinChannels(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Joins the client to the specified channels.
member.param: The names of the channels.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.PartChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Parts the client from the specified channel.
member.param: The name of the channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.PartChannels(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Parts the client from the specified channels.
member.param: The names of the channels.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.IsInChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the client is in the specified channel.
member.param: The channel name

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.SendMessage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the specified text as a message.
member.param: The message text.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.SendWhisper(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the specified text as a whisper to the specified user.
member.param: The name of the user.
The whisper text.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.BanUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Bans the specified user.
member.param: The name of the user.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.UnbanUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Unbans the specified user.
member.param: The name of the user.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ClearChat(System.String)
member.summary: Clears the chat.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.EnableEmoteOnly(System.String)
member.summary: Enables emote only mode.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.DisableEmoteOnly(System.String)
member.summary: Disables emote only mode.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.HostChannel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initiates a host for the specified channel.
member.param: The name of the channel to host.
The name of the channel to host from; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.UnhostChannel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Cancels a host for the specified channel.
member.param: The name of the channel to unhost.
The name of the channel to unhost from; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.AddStreamMarker(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a stream marker with the specified description.
member.param: The description text.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ModUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified user as a moderator.
member.param: The name of the user.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.UnmodUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified user as a moderator.
member.param: The name of the user.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ListMods(System.String)
member.summary: List the moderators.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.RaidChannel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initiates a raid for the specified channel.
member.param: The name of the channel to raid.
The name of the channel to raid from; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.CancelRaid(System.String)
member.summary: Cancels a raid.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.EnableSlowMode(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Enables slow mode for the specified time.
member.param: The amount of time in seconds; default: 60.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.DisableSlowMode(System.String)
member.summary: Disables slow mode.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.EnableSubscribersOnly(System.String)
member.summary: Enables subscriber only mode.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.DisableSubscribersOnly(System.String)
member.summary: Disables subscriber only mode.
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.TimeoutUser(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Times out the specified user.
member.param: The name of the user.
The amount of time in seconds; default: 600.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.UntimeoutUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Untimes out the specified user.
member.param: The name of the user.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.VIPUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified user as a VIP.
member.param: The name of the user.
The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.ListVIPs(System.String)
member.summary: List the VIPs
member.param: The name of the channel; default: sole connected channel.

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the client socket

member.name: M:ProtoSim.OmniTwitch.ChatClient.Dispose
member.summary: Initiates the client disposal.
